name: Beaked The Cultist
description:
Adds Beaked the Cultist as a new playable character. 

Recent Changes (0.5.4):
- 3 new boss relics. 
- Many Wither cards buffed.
- Giant Parasite is scarier, now an Act 3 Elite.
- Beaked is now yellow! Change costumes in Config.
- Start with Ceremony cards in certain custom modifiers.
- Beaked relics now usable by other characters.
- Disable Parasite and relic sharing in Config menu.
- Art for Tweet, by MagicHampster.
- Art for Mending Plumage, by Ashe.
- Placeholder card & relic art cleaned up.
- Overexert now properly causes HP loss.
- Flight fixed, made more stable.
- Added config menu image.
- Cards in Run History are now yellow.
- Ring of Chaos works better with Beaked.
- Crazy Rituals ordering improved.
- Updated credits.

If you contributed and don't see your name in the credits, please let us know!
